# Rogue's Stab (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Shadow Spells|shadow]]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 1]], [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[1st Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 1]], [[1st Level Shadowsworn Spells|Shadowsworn 1]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Zobeck Gazetteer for Pathfinder (Open Design), pg. 105

The target gains the ability to make sneak attacks as a rogue against opponents denied its Dexterity bonus to Armor Class or flanked. The target deals +1d6 damage when making such an attack. If the target can already make sneak attacks, that sneak attack damage increases by 1d6.
